column1: beaten first up! Full and swings away in the channel, Smith sticks his bat out. Passes the outside edge
an appeal for lbw, umpire Erasmus shakes his head. Big inswinger, the batsman falls over the flick and is rapped on the pad. This was sliding down leg, though
full outswinger outside off, Smith chases and misses
and again! Pitched up and swings away outside off, Smith has a leaden-footed drive and watches the ball defeat the outside edge
Smith puts bat on ball. Shorter and outside off, Smith gets on top of the bounce and guides it to backward point
similar length and outside off, Smith punches it straight to backward point. So, Bhuvneshwar begins with a maiden
dug in short and outside off, Baz aims to force a cut, he ends up dragging it past the stumps off an inside ede
banged in and tucks the batsman up for room, fended back to the bowler
short again, hint of swing on off, he hops and fends
short and wide outside off, sits up to be hit. Baz slashes a cut and finds Dhawan at cover point
short and outside leg 141ks as Baz makes room and comes down the track, some inswing beats the swinging bat
fullish and on off, Baz presses forward and pushes it to the covers. Nehra bowls a maiden of his own
back of a length and outside off, encouraging carry to Ojha. Smith throws his bat at it. He can't make contact. The pressure builds
shortish inswinger on off, Smith hangs back and works a single in front of midwicket. Lions get off the mark after 14 balls
back of a length and outside off, Baz slashes it away. Deep point has it covered

Bhuvneshwar takes out Dwayne Smith. Awayswinger outside off, back of a length, Smith flashes and sends an outside edge to short third man. Mustafiz completes a chest-high catch. Warner has his hands aloft in joy
short but not short enough, picked away off the hips past square le
shortish, no swing on middle, Baz stays back and blocks it back to the bowler
full and outside off, shoots low and dips under the bat. Ojha collects it after a couple of bounces
shortish and moves away outside off, Raina pushes it to the covers
short on off, Raina hops and works a single to mid-on. He hustles for a single. Dives and makes his ground. Bhuvneshwar ran in, collected the ball, but failed to throw the stumps down
good length and swerves away outside off, opens up Baz, and beats the outside edge. Was that a cutter?
Baz steps out, Nehra pulls his length back further. Flat-bats it to mid-off. Not timed by the opener
veering into the pads, Raina finds the release. He picks it up and flicks it in the air, squarer of fine leg
short on off, cramps the batsman for room, punchily played to mid-on
Raina steps away outside leg, Bhuvneshwar floats it outside off. Short and outside off, Raina aims for an inside-out loft. He ends up scooping it over mid-off.  Warner chases and keeps it to two
two sixes in three balls for Raina. Length ball on the leg stump, Raina presses forward and lofts it cleanly over long-on for a six
loose ball, heading down leg, Raina flicks it to the left of short fine leg for four
full and straight, push-driven straight to mid-off

Raina presses forward and chips a return catch to Bhuvneshwar. Nice and full, outside off, looked like it stopped a bit on the batsman. Raina drives early and lobs it back to Bhuvneshwar. Warner pumps his first. Lions are 24 for 2 in 5 and Mustafiz hasn't been introduced yet

The Fizz nearly strikes with his first ball. Cutter outside off, Baz attacks it. Baz aims leg side. He can only send an outside edge in the air over point. Dhawan runs back and looks to settle under it. He can't catch it on the rebound. The ball bobbled out on the first attempt, Dhawan then clutched it against his chest. But the ball popped out as he tumbled back and hit the ground
short on middle and leg, DK hops and fends back to the bowler
full and cuts away outside off, DK chases it with a late cut and misses

big appeal for a catch at backward point. Phenomenal effort from Williamson. He isn't sure, though. The soft signal is out. The finger goes up. DK is gone for a duck. He, perhaps, looks to play towards mid-on and spoons a leading edge towards backward point against a cutter. Williamson throws himself to his left and plucks the ball out with one hand. It snuck under his palm. The TV umpire Ananthapadmanabhan deems it a clean catch. The fielder took it inches from the ground
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
full at off, again, pushed to mid-off. Warner runs in, swoops down on the ball, but fumbles in a bid to break the stumps down at the non-striker's end
back of a length and outside off, run down to backward point
full and straight, clipped past midwicket
chest-high short ball, top-edged pull to fine leg
full and slid down leg, wide called
full and straight, played back to the bowler
full and outside off, slash and a miss
Sran rolls his fingers across this full one outside off. Too wide. Ojha collects it after a couple of bounces
another chest-high short ball, top-edged pull, Dhawan runs to his right from deep square leg to keep it to only one
full and on off, back-foot drive, finds mid-off
slower full toss on middle, offcutting ball, hits the boot as the batsman flicks early and does not connect
another slower offcutter on middle, Baz can't manufacture his own pace. Poked back to the bowler

Warner takes it at long-off and roars. Lions four down. Full offcutter on off, Baz skips out and goes for a loft. He can only toe-end it to long-off. Warner runs to his right and dives to catch it. He pumped his fists in air-borne mode before tumbling onto the ground. Baz falls for 7 off 19 balls
low full toss outside off, Finch wants to drive but doesn't move his feet. He sends an inside edge to fine leg
off-stump yorker, which is squeezed to mid-off
drifting down leg, wide
Finch steps away outside leg, Yuvraj dangles this wide outside. Finch swings and gets an inside edge which whizzes past the off stump and sneaks away fine
tossed up and slight turn outside off, Bravo gets forward and drives it through the covers
flicked off the pads to deep backward square leg
floated outside off, extra bounce, gets an inside edge to fine leg
Yuvraj tosses it on up, defended off the front foot. The speedgun shows 92ks, that looked pretty slow
flighted and spins in, Bravo pokes and may have managed an inside edge onto the pad
too straight in line, tucked away to fine leg for one
shortish and slid down leg for a wide
and again! Henriques slips another one down leg
full and swings away outside off, Bravo reaches out for a drive with his hands as the ball passes the outside edge. No feet movement
low full toss outside off, slapped away to deep point
short and wide outside off, Finch carves it over backward point. Dhawan runs to his left from deep point and slides in vain
full and on off, tapped into the covers off the front foot
Finch stands tall and punches this short ball on off to long-on for one
half-tracker on middle, pulled to deep midwicket
floated and turns away outside off, Bravo slices it in the air over backward point. Williamson runs back but can't crack this
knocked to midwicket
flatter and outside off, Finch hangs back and slaps to deep point
back of a length and outside off, punched down to Warner at long-off
fired full on middle and leg, nudging to 100ks, pushed down to long-on
short, Finch drags the pull from outside off. Pulled over square leg. Hooda runs across and slides to his right from deep midwicket but is beaten
slower full toss, bunted to long-on
back of a length and angled away outside off, run down to third man for one
short and wide outside off, cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
back of a length and outside off, slashed to deep point with a flourish
tucked off the pads to backward square leg
Full and angling away outside off, chipped to long-off
angled into the pads, fuller in length, Bravo picks it up and flicks it over short fine leg
banged in short, angled in, fended back to the bowler
full and attacking the stumps, angled in, chipped over the bowler's head
full and wide outside off, Bravo reaches out with his hands and slices it to third man
back of a length and angled in, punchily played back to Nehra
starts off with a short cross-seamer, blocked back to the bowler
full and skiddy ball on the leg stump, whipped to midwicket
cutter on middle, only blocked back to the bowler
full on middle, backs away and drives to long-off
full on middle, dabbed to midwicket
full and cuts away, run away towards point

Vijay Shankar takes it at the edge of the boundary. Back of a length on off, Bravo slogs across the line. His head falls over. Shankar runs to his left from deep square leg, dives, and pouches it even as he tumbles sideways into the ground near the deep midwicket region. Shankar wasn't in contact with the ad boards. The TV umpire confirms it. Outstanding effort from Shankar
back of length on off, poked to the covers
veering into the pads, glanced to long leg
short and homing in on the ribs, fended to cover
straying into the pads, flicked to left of fine leg
full on middle, pushed past Sran to mid-off for one
slower ball, 115ks, short and outside off, guided to point
short and wide outside off, 130ks, cut to sweeper cover
Finch shuffles outside leg, the bowler chases him with a full ball, glanced to fine leg
offcutter outside off, cut away towards deep point

Warner puts down a simple catch at long-off. He puts his hand up in apology right away. Finch manufactures room outside leg to open up the off side. This is full around off and middle. Finch aims for a loft. He can only miscue it. Warner runs in, lifts his left leg, gets into an awkward position, and spills it
overpitched and outside off, Jadeja drills a drive in the gap between covers and mid-off for four
back of a length and cuts away outside off, 122ks, the batsman loses his shape. Swings and misses
another cutter outside off, Finch targets the leg side with a slog and sends an outside edge to third man. Sran runs to his left, slides, and keeps it to two
full and cuts away wide outside off, sliced over backward point
140ks, nails an off-stump yorker, jammed back to the bowler
dug in short on middle, pulled straight to short fine leg
cutter outside off, pushed through the cover-point region off the front foot for one
off-stump yorker, squeezed to long-off
Finch moves away outside leg, Nehra his the back pad. The ball dribbles past the leg stump to the keeper
full and keeps low outside off, Finch loses his shape. Swipes and does not connect. This is a two-paced pitch and it looks increasingly difficult to hit
yorker on middle, jabbed to long-on
short and wide outside off, Jadeja cracks a cut and dispatches it past backward point. He had ample width to free his arms
banged in and tucks Jadeja up for room now. Flat-batted towards midwicket
Jadeja picks out mid-off. Full on middle, slower cutter. Mid-off was inside the circle. Jadeja was aiming to go over him. He can only mis-hit it to Bhuvneshwar there
wide yorker outside off, can't be dug out
off-stump yorker, 122ks, squeezed to the covers
yorker outside off, Mustafiz cranks up to 144ks, Finch swings and the ball hustles under his bat to Ojha
back of a length, slower on middle, Finch waits, goes across the line and clouts it over midwicket for six
full and right at the base of the stumps, Finch slogs again. He has to settle with an inside edge onto the pad
fires a yorker on middle, clears his front leg, and drags it to long-on for two
Finch shuffles outside leg, the bowler chases him with a low full toss. Toe-ended to the covers
slower one outside off, 113ks, Praveen swings early and gets an inside edge past the off stump. It rolls to the fine leg boundary
short and slower outside off, the ball is not coming on to the bat. Praveen waited for the ball to arrive and forced to mid-off
pretty full on middle, Finch hoicks it to deep midwicket. He wants two. He dives and makes his ground. Hooda was the fielder from the deep, throwing to Ojha

leg-stump yorker, jabbed to deep midwicket. Finch wants two again. He doesn't dive this time. Flat throw, Ojha gathers it, and breaks the stumps. Is the bat on the line? The TV umpire feels that Finch has just made it. He finishes 51 not out
cuts away from a length, defended from the crease towards point
Warner seems surprised by the bounce on that one, he was looking ot get forward but seeing it lift from a back of a length, he shifts to the back foot and defends towards cover
a quick two to get the first runs of the innings, it was on the pads, Warner gets in the crease and clip it towards square leg, didn't seem like there was time for two, but they race back
just a touch of room to swing the arms, punched between a shortish extra cover and mid-off, Praveen is not happy with the fielder, but there was no chance of stopping that
dabbed towards the off side for a single
down the leg side, Praveen has the ball curling around, off the pads and a diving stop by Dinesh Karthik
short on the hips, stops on Warner. Flicked over backward square leg. Bravo slips in the deep. 'Juggling with the legs,' says Sammy on commentary
leg-side wide
Bang! Back of a length on middle, Warner goes deep in the crease and smokes it straight down the ground
short and wide outside off, Warner reaches out for a cut and does not connect
shortish and on middle, skewed to short fine leg off an inside edge
short and outside off, Warner skips back and muscles a pull over midwicket for six
short again, outside off, Warner rides the bounce and plays to third man for one
yorker on middle, Warner, having backed away outside leg, slices it to point
full and outside off, Dhawan drives it to mid-off. Bravo throws the stumps down at the non-striker's end. They take another one off the ricochet. Warner is back on strike
leg-stump yorker, dug out to mid-off
overpitched on middle, Warner sizes it up and flat-bats it back to the bowler. The ball pings Praveen's left boot even as he looks to get out of the way. Warner puts his hand up in apology
Warner shuffles outside leg, the bowler follows with a short ball. Punched to cover-point where Baz fumbles, deflecting it to the man at extra-cover
Warner keeps moving around the crease, Praveen bowls a yorker on leg, clipped to long-on
and he strikes first ball. Warner has a wry smile. Warner shapes to pull a not-so short ball outside off. Warner mis-times it, off the toe end, and finds Praveen at mid-on
short and outside off, Williamson rises on top of the bounce and punches to cover
good length on off, Williamson gets behind the line in defence
short and around off, Williamson plays late and angles it to slip
classy from Williamson. Back of a length on off, Williamson allows the ball to come to him and steers it between backward point and cover-point. How late did he play that?
and again! Back of a length and outside off, deftly run down to third man
full and outside off, wristy drive towards point
Williamson steps out, this is shorter and outside off. He controls a pull to deep midwicket
tap-and-run single to cover for one. It was a slower ball on middle at 111ks and the batsman waited on it
full cutter outside off, KW dabs it... DK dives and stops the ball
Praveen gets Williamson. Back of a length and outside off, it does not come on to the batsman. He punches on the up and Smith dives to his left at short cover to complete the catch
full and attacking off, blocked to cover
pitched up and outside off, driven to the covers again
slower ball outside off, drilled to the covers
short on middle, Dhawan short-arm pulls it to deep midwicket
back of a length and leaves the right-hander, wafts and misses
full on middle, punched to mid-on
shortish and outside off, Henriques throws his hands at a cut and the outside edge flies to the right of the diving Dwayne Smith at lone slip
half-tracker outside off, slapped to long-off
fizzes through outside off and turns away from the right hander, beaten past the outside edge
slider outside off, 98ks, cuts and misses
not much turn, short again, Henriques does not connect with a pull and is hit on the body
short and outside off, bounces past the outside edge. DK is beaten as well
overpitched and outside off, driven to the covers
flat,  non-turning ball outside off, punched down the ground
flicked off the pads to deep midwicket
floated up on off, played back to the bowler
fires outside off, beaten on the cut
clipped to midwicket
Dhawan waits on the back foot against this slower ball outside off and dabs a single past a diving short third man
shortish and spins away from the right-hander, punched in the gap at the covers. Dhawal manages to collect the ball and parry it back to Tye
wristy drive straight to cover
too full and outside off, Henriques stretches forward and drives it to the cover boundary
darted short and wide outside off, beats the cut
overpitched and outside off, caressed through point
no turn at all, full and outside off, shovelled to long-on
Kaushik belts out an appeal for lbw. Not given. Grips the surface and Dhawan is hit high on the back pad in line with middle. It looked very close. Height may have been an issue?
full and outside off, slashed to third man off an outside edge
Bravo strikes second ball. He sets off on an airplane celebration. Short ball down the leg side, Henriques aims to pull. He can only pop it behind off the glove. DK dives to his left and pouches it
Bravo greets him with a bouncer, Yuvraj ducks under it
back of a length and in the channel outside off, left alone
pitched up and outside off, Yuvraj leans into a drive and creams it to sweeper cover
slower ball on the pads, flicked neatly to deep midwicket
pitches marginally outside leg and turns in to hit the pad, the lbw appeal is shot down
fired short on off, Dhawan makes room and late-cuts it away behind point, that's pretty fine and Sangwan can't hunt it down
short and outside off, chopped to Sangwan at deep backward point
straight ball on middle, defended back to the bowler
skiddy ball on middle, dabbed with an open face in front of point
drifting down leg, Dhawan shapes to sweep. Gloved fine of short fine leg
dipping slower full ball on middle,  Yuvraj toe-ends it to midwicket
full and outside off, Dhawan eases a drive to Raina at short extra cover
back of a length and outside off, punched to Jadeja at point. He fumbles but Yuvraj sends Dhawan back
low full toss on the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg
dug in short on middle, swatted away towards deep midwicket
wide full toss, carved to sweeper cover
dug in short and outside off, Dhawan hops and upper cuts it to third man for four
half volley on the pads, easily flicked past short fine leg for four
short and outside off, Dhawan leans back and cuts to backward point
back of a length on middle, patted down the round
back of a length and stops on the batsman outside off, change of pace? Yuvraj plays early and chips it over extra cover
short and outside off, pulled between deep midwicket and long-on
short and angled away outside off, gets on top of the bounce, punching to mid-off
short and wide outside off, slapped to backward point, possibly off the toe end
bouncer outside off, Yuvraj ducks under it
dug in short and outside off again, waist-high short ball this. Yuvraj pulls and only connects with thin air
back of a length and outside off, forced to mid-off

Yuvraj holes out to sweeper cover for 5 off 14. He backs away outside leg. Dhawal floats it full and outside off. The batsman reaches out and slices it off an outside edge to Sangwan. Kulkarni caps a wicket maiden, his third this season
tossed on off, he looks to work to leg and gets an leading edge towards point. Kaushik fumbles and gifts an extra run
down the track and driven to long-on. They hare across for two
length and outside off, pushed to cover
round-armish ball on off, nudged to midwicket
full and straight, turned behind square for one

104ks, darted outside off, Hooda waits and use the pace, running it fine of Praveen at short third man. He chases and aims to flick it back into play. But loses his balance and falls over the ad boards. The ball rolls away for four
back of a length on off, chopped to point
short and cramps the batsman for room, punched to long-on
short and on off, bunted to mid-off
short and outside off, Dhawan likes room. He flays an uppish cut over backward point
the batsman comes down the track, this is banged short. Dhawan chips to short extra cover. He takes on Raina and dives for a single. Raina did not throw the stumps down
short and just a shade outside off, chopped to point
deflected off the pads to short fine leg
flat and full on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
pitches outside leg and skids off the surface to rap the pad. The ball rolls to off and they take a leg bye
overpitched and outside off, crisply driven to the left of long-off. Bravo runs to his left, bends low, but the ball shoots through his hands for four
slider on off, 97ks, chopped to short third man
shortish and turns in with some extra bounce to catch the pad

dipping slow full toss outside off, 111ks, heaved to deep midwicket. The fielder breaks the stumps with a direct hit but Dhawan is home, sliding his bat in. The richochet hit Raina just below the knee
Another innocuous ball down the leg side. Slower and short down the leg side, Hooda is late on the pull. The ball kisses the glove and DK takes another catch, moving to his left
slower ball on off, pokes and gets an inside edge behind to DK

shortish and outside off, cut away to deep backward point. Ojha slipped at the striker's end before going for the second. He recovers and they push for the second. Dhawan dives and makes his ground. The throw from the deep was flat and DK whipped the bails off. But Dhawan is home
back of a length on middle, punched to the right of extra cover. Raina dives to his right and rolls over the ball
low full toss on off, 113ks, scooped to long-off
slower ball on the pads, bunted to wide long-on. They take two. Praveen isn't pleased
full on middle, backs away and scythes it to Raina at extra cover. Dhawan sets off but is sent back
full ball on middle, clears his front leg and swings it cleanly straight over the bowler's head. Beats long-off (Baz) to his right, one-bounce four. Long-on had no chance as well
slower bouncer outside off, Ojha drops his gloves and gets out of the way. Wided for height
yorker on leg stump, jammed out to the covers
full and heading down the leg side, easy peasy for Dhawan. Picks up and flicks to the backward square leg boundary
Dhawan finishes the chase with back-to-back fours. He swings outside leg, Praveen chases him. The opener creams a drive through the covers. He twirls his mustache.
